strings.ErrorClipboardPermissionDesc:
sptfy.in can't access the most recent item in your clipboard without your permission.

if you don't want to give access, you can paste the link manually instead.

if you do want to, go to site settings and enable the clipboard permission.
see how to
strings.ErrorClipboardNoSpotifyURLDesc:
we couldn't find a spotify link in your clipboard üßê.

make sure you have a valid spotify link copied and try again.

or if you think this is a bug, contact me
strings.ErrorCreateRecordDesc:
there's an unexpected error
we couldn't create the link for you üò¢.

please try again or contact me if you think this is a bug.
strings.ErrorCreatedRecordNoInputDesc:
it seems like you did not provide any link,
please check the input field

please try again with a valid link or
contact me if you think this is something else or a bug.
